BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_SHOP_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_SHOP_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_SHOP_NUMBER, DT_CONSTRUCTION_DATE, STR_SHOP_NAME, NUM_SHOP_AREA, STR_SHOP_LOCATION, NUM_SHOP_RENT, NUM_SHOP_ELECT_AMOUNT, NUM_SHOP_WATER_AMOUNT, NUM_WATER_PENALTY_AMT_PER, NUM_RENT_PENALTY_AMT_PER, NUM_ELECT_PENALTY_AMT_PER, STR_UNIT, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS,STR_STATUS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO EST_SHOP_ITEM_MAP (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_SHOP_ID, STR_ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, NUM_ITEM_ID, STR_ITEM_NAME, DT_DATE_OF_INSTALLATION, DT_DATE_OF_REMOVAL, STR_DESCRIPTION, GDT_EFFECT_FRM, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE EST_SHOP_MST SET STR_SHOP_NUMBER=?,DT_CONSTRUCTION_DATE=?,STR_SHOP_NAME=?,NUM_SHOP_AREA=?,NUM_SHOP_RENT=?,NUM_SHOP_ELECT_AMOUNT=?,NUM_SHOP_WATER_AMOUNT=?,NUM_WATER_PENALTY_AMT_PER=?,NUM_RENT_PENALTY_AMT_PER=?,NUM_ELECT_PENALTY_AMT_PER=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?,GSTR_REMARKS=?,GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE NUM_SHOP_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_SHOP_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_SHOP_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_SHOP_ITEM_MAP SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_SHOP_ID=?
DELETE FROM EST_SHOP_ITEM_MAP A WHERE NUM_SHOP_ID=?
UPDATE EST_SHOP_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1) WHERE T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_SHOP_ID=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO EST_SHOP_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_SHOP_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_SHOP_NUMBER, DT_CONSTRUCTION_DATE, STR_SHOP_NAME, NUM_SHOP_AREA, STR_SHOP_LOCATION, NUM_SHOP_RENT, NUM_SHOP_ELECT_AMOUNT, NUM_SHOP_WATER_AMOUNT, NUM_WATER_PENALTY_AMT_PER, NUM_RENT_PENALTY_AMT_PER, NUM_ELECT_PENALTY_AMT_PER, STR_UNIT, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE EST_SHOP_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_SHOP_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
